Event.name: Planting
Event.definition: <def-root>This frame describes a situation in which the <fen>Agent</fen> puts the <fen>Theme</fen> into the <fen>Ground</fen> for the purpose of growing. <ex><fex name="Agent">He</fex> <fex name="Time">recently</fex> <t>planted</t> <fex name="Theme">some old apple trees</fex>. <fex name="Ground">INI</fex> </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fen>Theme</fen> is the item planted by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Instrument</fen> is used by the <fen>Agent</fen> as a tool to help obtain the <fen>Theme</fen>. (This tool is not limited to typical artifacts and can be hands, arms, and other atypical hunting and fishing instruments.) </def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>For what length of time the <fen>Agent</fen> plants the <fen>Theme</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Agent</fen> plants the <fen>Theme</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition: <def-root>The failure or success of an attempt. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The greater geographic location where the <fen>Agent</fen> plants the <fen>Theme</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Agent</fen> intends to accomplish by planting the <fex name="Theme">Theme</fex>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element selects some gradable attribute and modifies the expected value for it. </def-root>

Arg.name: Ground
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Ground</fen> is the background or context to which the <fen>Agent</fen> pays attention in his agricultural efforts.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Depictive</fen> describes a participant in the Planting action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Co-participant
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Co-participant</fen> is an entity that participates in the planting event in a coordinated way with another participant.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the planting event logically follows.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: plant.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to place seeds in the ground so that they may sprout and grow

lexUnit.name: sow.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: put seeds into the ground so that they may grow
